structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Proceedings Against Absent Defendants And Upon Insufficient Service

law.catch_line: Attachment Of Realty; Dismissal Of Action Upon Failure Of Notice
law.text: If real property of a non-resident is attached and no personal service is made upon him, the action shall be dismissed unless notice thereof is given, in such manner as the court orders, within one year after the commencement of the action.
